resources.string: Your 4-digit lock code has been encrypted and saved. Please note: if you forget your 4-digit lock code you must clear Simple\'s data from your devices settings menu.

Your data is your data. We Do not. Will not and have never collected your data.
Disable images on mobile data to save on data usage. Images will load normally on WiFi.
If you forget your pin, please clear Simple\'s data from your phones application manager.
Your device doesn\'t support this feature.
Enable to color the navigation bar to match your accent color.
Enable to color the status bar to match your accent color.
When enabled Top Stories will be loaded in the first tab, while Most Recent will be loaded in the second tab.
An unexpected error occurred.\nSorry for the inconvenience. Please send us this bug report so that we can investigate the cause.
Pin code incorrect. You have, %d attempt(s) left.
Are you sure you would like to remove: \"%s\", from your pins? This action cannot be undone.
Would you like to remove all %s of your pins? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you would like to remove this pin? This cannot be undone.
Would you like to reset all pins to the default pins list? Resetting pins deletes all of your current pins. Resetting your pins cannot be undone.
When enabled bottom tabs will be locked in place. Disable to hide tabs on scroll.
Enable to show tab titles. Disable to hide them.
Notification settings for Simple Lite Facebook notifications.
Notification settings for Simple Lite message notifications.
Setup settings for your preferred notification sound, LED, vibration and importance.
Setup settings for your preferred message notification sound, LED, vibration and importance.
Adjust how to open links. Adjust Popup View.
"Choose Simple Lite\'s accent and app colors. Tint your navigation bar, and turn on Auto Night Mode.
"Remove 'People You May Know'. Choose your feed preference.
Enable or disable settings for general notifications and messages. Adjust sync interval.
"Enable or disable Simple Lock. Enable location for check-ins.
"Disable tab labels. Lock tabs in position. Swipe between tabs.
When enabled you will have the option to send a crash report. An app restart will be required to activate this option.
Help others enjoy Simple Lite by rating the app on Google Play.
Long press items to view them without leaving the content you are viewing.
Tap here to check Facebook\'s current status. This checks for issues or outages.
Disclaimer: these results are generated from the current status from the site listed above. These results are not monitored or maintained by Creative Trends Apps LLC and can change at anytime.
%s recommends that you update to the latest version (%s). Updates include improvements and bug fixes. Tap update to open the Play Store.

Enable to move the main tabs to the top of the screen. When enabled locking tabs will be disabled as well as showing tab titles. Panels will be hidden while enabled. Panel options will be available in the overflow menu (3 dots).
Auto close video player. Auto replay video. Always show controls.
Are you sure you would like to delete %s from your device? This cannot be undone.
Enter a name and url for your custom Smart Pin.
